title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8186-3.6 - Limitations on special equalization rates and change in level factors for assessment purposes
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8186-3.6 - Limitations on special equalization rates and change in level factors for assessment purposes

State Regulations
(a) Special equalization rates and change in level of assessment factors may only
be established until the approval deadline. (b) A special equalization rate of 100.00 is
established where a special equalization rate greater than 100.00 would
otherwise be determined for the purpose of determining: (1)
agricultural value ceilings; (2)
assessments of oil and gas economic
units; and
(3)
alternative veterans
exemptions. (c) Special
equalization rates for alternative veterans exemption purposes are not
established for special assessing units. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§§
8186-3.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
